data.title: Leash Camera Strap by Peak Design
data.description:
Leash by Peak Design. The most versatile and quick-connecting camera strap in the world.  

Check out more at: https://peakdesign.com/store/leash

Easily configure Leash as a sling strap, neck strap, safety tether, video stabilizer and more. When you don’t need a strap, Leash quickly disconnects and stores in your pocket, purse or camera bag.

data.title: All New Leash - Tips & Instructions
data.description:
Learn more at https://peakdesign.com/leash

Nobody (and we mean NOBODY) will get you more physically and emotionally in tune with the new Peak Design Leash minimalist camera strap that our Art Director Lawrence "Fruit Loops" Lander and his adorable puppy sidekick.

LOOKING FOR SOMETHING SPECIFIC?
Jump to the juicy bits by clicking the links below:

Compatibility (5:14)

data.title: Design Deep Dive - Everyday Backpack by Peak Design
data.description:
Learn more and buy now at: https://peakdesign.com/everyday-backpack

Peak Design Head Designer Art Viger and CEO Peter Dering discuss the features and functions of the Everyday Backpack. They also share our team's thinking and design philosophies that went into this bag's creation.

data.title: Everyday Backpack: Tips, Features, and Functions
data.description:
Buy now at https://peakdesign.com/everyday-backpack

Dive deep into the features and functionality of the Everyday Backpack (20L and 30L) with head designer Art Viger.

If you're not all about sitting through a 30-minute video, below is a list of pertinent time stamps so you can quickly get to the section you're most interested in.

Introduction (0:00)
Side Access (0:30)
Basic Divider Overview (1:07)
Divider Setup Part 1 (3:17)
Divider Setup Part 2 (4:41)
Divider Setup Part 3 (5:04) Passthrough Long Lens (6:10)
Divider Setup Part 4 (6:28) Pockets and Holding Small Lenses
Common Camera Setups (7:03) Long Lens
Common Camera Setups (7:23) Holy Trinity (30L Backpack)
Common Camera Setups (7:58) Passthrough Camera Grip
Daily Carry Part 1 (8:25) Single Divider
Daily Carry Part 2 (9:03) Two Dividers
Interior Pocket Overview (9:36)
Top Access MagLatch (10:20)
Laptop Compartment (11:46)
Security Zipper Overview (13:45)
Side Pocket Overview Part 1 (15:25) Tripod Carry
Side Pocket Overview Part 2 (16:33) Single Leg Tripod Carry
Key Tether (16:54)
External Carry Part 1 (17:31) Including Vertical Carry
External Carry Part 2 (19:06)
Drone Carry Part 1 (19:30) Internal Carry
Drone Carry Part 2 (19:54) External Carry
Luggage Passthrough (21:06)
Shoulder and Sternum Strap Overview (21:37)
Sternum Strap Closer Look (23:46)
Waist Belt Overview (24:42)
Capture Clip Attachment (26:27)
Why the bag stands up (27:15)
Bag Care and Maintenance (28:09) 
Conclusion (28:58)

data.title: Everyday Sling 5L Camera and Drone Bag - Instructions & Tips
data.description:
Learn more at https://peakdesign.com/everyday-sling-5

Peak Design photographer and art director Lawrence walks through setup and use of the new Everyday Sling 5L. Included is an explanation of all features, as well as examples of how the bag can be packed with mirrorless gear, DSLR gear, or DJI Mavic or Spark drone gear. He also walks through the differences between the 5L and 10L Peak Design slings.

asset.author: Peak Design Video

data.title: New Everyday Sling 5L - Design Deep Dive
data.description: As the smallest, lightest bag in our Everyday Line, the Everyday Sling 5L is ideal for organization, transport, and quick-access of essentials, whether you’re carrying a camera, drone, or everyday gear. Specifically designed to carry the DJI Mavic and Spark drone kits, mirrorless cameras, or even DSLRs.
